set.title: Public REST API
set.description: Public REST API for gateway functionality and synchronization between a Couchbase Lite application and a Couchbase Server database

introduction.paragraph: The Public REST API provides gateway functionality and synchronization between a Couchbase Lite application and a Couchbase Server database. This article introduces the Public REST API and includes an overview of the available resources.

body.note: In the URI paths shown below, any path component surrounded by curly braces, { }, is a placeholder for a name that can vary; for example, {db} refers to the name of the database.
body.paragraph: Following are resources for the Sync (Public) REST API:

row.entry: Performs operations on servers (Sync Gateway instances). Examples include getting information about a Sync Gateway instance and getting a list of all databases served by the instance.

Performs operations on databases. Examples include configuring a new database and compacting a database. Some database operations operate on all or many documents in the database, for example, getting a changes feed for all documents.
Performs operations on specific documents. Examples include creating and deleting documents.
Performs operations on document attachments. Examples include creating and deleting document attachments.
Performs operations on local documents. Examples include creating and deleting local documents.
